DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish Chinese neonatal network investigate current situation neonatal birth weight related factor . We investigate risk factor sex , gestational age , region , nation , altitude , place residence , maternal occupation , education level mother , maternal age , maternal pregnancy diseases multiple birth .
DOC.brief_title: A Population-based Investigation Related Factors Birth Weight China
DOC.criteria: live birth Gestational age 24 week 43 week Major malformation Physical deformity Fetal edema Body mass diagnose prenatal ultrasound Acute blood loss delivery
